title: The Rumors Are True: Jonathan Anderson Is Going to Dior (Men)
description: For months, the fashion industry has been playing an accelerated game of creative director musical chairs. Today, another chair has been filled — sort of. British designer Jonathan Anderson is reportedly working on the Dior Men Summer 2026 collection, the brand confirmed. He succeeds Kim ...Continue reading
author: Catie Pusateri and Janelle Sessoms
